================ pojištění

## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer for the Supply and Delivery of Milk

#### Version: 2nd Amendment

##### Tender Information

* Title: 21501-243687 – Milk - CSC
* Reference Number: WS4287564639-Doc4287708221
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4287564639
* Publication Date: January 26, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Date: February 9, 2024

##### Contract Details

* Expected Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected End Date: February 28, 2027
* Tender Status: Exired

##### Procurement Details

* UN/SPSC Code: 50131700 (Milk and butter products)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others.

##### Delivery Regions

* Saskatchewan
* Alberta
* Manitoba

##### Contracting and End User Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

##### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Tanya Gostev
* Contact Email: tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18631426?extsite=MTg2MzE0MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

##### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), seeks geographically zone-based Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) for the supply and delivery of milk on an as and when requested basis. All bids must be submitted by February 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT to be considered responsive. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. Supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the specified tender closing date.
